Sentence: Ruth married Andrew Dennis McBride, a black man from North Carolina
In Harlem, Ruth met Dennis, to whom she (Ruth) was immediately attracted
She (Ruth) married him (Dennis), converted to Christianity, and became very involved with church activities
Dennis and Ruth opened the New Brown Memorial Church together in memory of Reverend Brown, their favorite preacher
When Ruth became pregnant with Dennis's eighth child, James, Dennis fell ill with lung cancer, and died before James was born
